mediumBlogs.title: What is IEnumerable, ICollection, IList, and IQueryable
mediumBlogs.description: Understand the key differences between IQueryable and in-memory collections like IEnumerable, ICollection, and IList in C#.

mediumBlogs.title: How C# Convert Works Behind the Scenes: Types, IConvertible, and Culture-Specific Parsing
mediumBlogs.description: Explore how C#’s Convert class handles type conversion using IConvertible, manages overflows, and respects culture settings when parsing values like strings to numbers.

mediumBlogs.title: How to Remember Dependency Injection in .NET Using Mnemonics
mediumBlogs.description: Learn the basics of Dependency Injection in .NET and how to remember its key concepts using simple mnemonics. This guide breaks down DI types like Singleton with easy-to-remember analogies to make the pattern stick. Perfect for beginners and anyone who wants a quick mental shortcut.
